Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Hey. $Name$ right? Glad you made it. I'm $Actor_16$, and I'm here to help you with building the town itself.]
[Name:2][Text:Hey, $Name$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.][Default]
[Name:ShopOpen][Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Selection:Shop]
[Name:Task_0_Start][Text:We have to build a $WorldObject_112$ so that visiting merchants will have a place to trade goods. Choose a spot, and let me know when you're done, OK?][UnlockObjectID:112]

[Name:Task_0_End][Text:Is the $WorldObject_112$ finished? Great! I think a merchant is set to come tomorrow, but I don't think we have anything to sell him... Check the woods to the West, yeah? I'm sure you can find herbs, and berries or something that he'd take money for. Oh, and before I forget, here. Take a look through these notes when you have a minute.][Face:Happy]
